name: The Ooze
overview: When Dr. Caine discovers his company's plan to release a deadly virus into the atmosphere, his boss exposes him to radioactive matter...transforming Dr. Caine into the Ooze! Now, just a puddle of toxic waste, The Ooze must slime through mazes and around obstacles as he seeks his revenge against the company! The Ooze can jab with a slimy punch, spew toxic spit, or just absorb enemies into his sloppy mass.
